Lems.description: A number of ComponentTypes for rate based/population models. Base type of any cell/population which has a (dimensionless) rate _R. Generic nonlinear 2-D (phase plane) oscillator.

Constant.name: tau
Constant.description: A time-scale hierarchy can be introduced for the state variables :math:`V` and :math:`W`. Default parameter is 1, which means no time-scale hierarchy.

Constant.name: I
Constant.description: Baseline shift of the cubic nullcline

Constant.name: a
Constant.description: Vertical shift of the configurable nullcline

Constant.name: b
Constant.description: Linear slope of the configurable nullcline

Constant.name: c
Constant.description: Parabolic term of the configurable nullcline

Constant.name: d
Constant.description: Temporal scale factor. Warning: do not use it unless you know what you are doing and know about time tides.

Constant.name: e
Constant.description: Coefficient of the quadratic term of the cubic nullcline.

Constant.name: f
Constant.description: Coefficient of the cubic term of the cubic nullcline.

Constant.name: g
Constant.description: Coefficient of the linear term of the cubic nullcline.

Constant.name: alpha
Constant.description: Constant parameter to scale the rate of feedback from the slow variable to the fast variable.

Constant.name: beta
Constant.description: Constant parameter to scale the rate of feedback from the slow variable to itself

Constant.name: gamma
Constant.description: Constant parameter to reproduce FHN dynamics where excitatory input currents are negative. It scales both I and the long range coupling term..

TimeDerivative.value: d * tau * (alpha * W - f * powf(V, 3) + e * powf(V, 2) + g * V + gamma * I + gamma * c_0 + lc_0 * V)
d * (a + b * V + c * powf(V, 2) - beta * W) / tau

Function.name: pre
Function.description: pre synaptic function for coupling activity

Function.name: post
Function.description: post synaptic function for coupling activity

Constant.name: noise_seed
Constant.description: A random seed used to initialise the random_stream if it is missing.

Constant.name: random_stream
Constant.description: An instance of numpy's RandomState associated with this specific Noise object. Used when you need to resume a simulation from a state saved to disk

Constant.name: nsig
Constant.description: The noise dispersion, it is the standard deviation of the distribution from which the Gaussian random variates are drawn. NOTE: Sensible values are typically ~gt 1% of the dynamic range of a Model's state variables.

Constant.name: nsig
Constant.description: The noise dispersion, it is the standard deviation of the distribution from which the Gaussian random variates are drawn. NOTE: Sensible values are typically ~gt 1% of the dynamic range of a Model's state variables.

Constant.name: b
Constant.description: A function evaluated on the state-variables, the result of which enters as the diffusion coefficient.
